name: Venturex Partners (VPFX)
description:
Our primary product at VPFX is a dual cloud-based payments solution. Our clients receive exceptional currency exchange rates for their personal or business transactions, typically beating their current provider by up to 5%. We use SWIFT GPI, localised currency accounts, and two of the worlds largest Investment Banks to ensure transactions are secure, fast, and efficient. Our clients have access to their own E-Wallet; where they can store, exchange, send/receive, or hedge currency instantly.

Our primary customers are businesses exchanging & transacting currency as part of their day-to-day operations. Whether this is a small 'mom-&-pop' shop in the USA purchasing products from China, or a U.K. based mining company paying its employees in South Africa. Our consultants also provide a personal, almost concierge-like service for HNW/UHNW's who require large transactions processed.

jobs.title: Foreign Exchange Sales Consultant (comm's based)
jobs.description:
- Generate new leads via email, phone, LinkedIn etc
- Assist with client KYC/AML requests from compliance
- Capitalise on your existing network to rapidly build your "client book"

We are looking for highly driven & entrepreneurial individuals who are keen to build a strong source of income via commission. Remote working preferred, though we do have an office in Central London that can be used to host client meetings.
